text: Roary the Racing Car (also referred to as Roary for short) is a British stop- motion children's television series produced by Cosgrove Hall Films, Chapman Entertainment and HIT Entertainment. It follows the adventures of Roary and his racing car friends at Silver Hatch race track. In the US, it was aired on PBS Kids Sprout in 2008 to 2012. == Plot == Roary is a red racing car that competes in big races in the Silver Valley. His friends are the driver Maxi and the mechanic Chris, with whom he experiences many adventures. title: Roary the Racing Car
